comment: She's very chaotic. Some people like it and others hate it. As someone who deals with a lot of mental health issues, she tends to use hers as a crutch and makes weird jokes about it all the time. Also goes off topic a lot. On the last day of class she gave out male contraceptives with animal facts on them. Very incredibly weird.
Mrs. Pede is great. She is really funny and her class is fun. There are a lot of assignments, but they will help your grade. The tests were hard to me. Make sure to study the PowerPoints.
I love Tyler! Class is never boring, she's hilarious, class was simple

Professor Pede is AMAZING! She is so funny and makes the class fun. I wish she taught other classes so I could take her again. Make sure you keep up with the assigned readings, she sometimes does pop quizzes.
Favorite prof I've ever had; super funny & fun! Just turn work in on time, exactly as assigned and you're good. Textbook is said to be required but dont bother buying.

Tyler is the best. She is hilarious and has fun while teaching. She gives study guides for all of the tests and quizzes. There were 2 group work projects but both are on fun topics. Choose your groups wisely! Other than that you will love her and the class.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious

comment: She's a great professor stuck teaching a terrible class. She's a very easy grader as long as you turn in everything on time in the way she asks. Don't bother buying the book; she'll say you need to use it to study but her tests are super easy, and you can just use the notes from class.
Tyler was a great professor. Just be warned, turn in your stuff on time. That is how you get an A.

This teacher was nice and funny, but she is crazy about group projects. She gives so many pointless, annoying  projects throughout the semester, but as long as you do them your good. She made this class a lot harder than it had to be with all the work but it's still an easy A class.

Tyler was an awesome teacher for Freshman Seminar, she made a really boring class super fun and only taught material from the textbook that actually mattered. She also works in the nest and I think everyone in my class chose her as an adviser, she's always super helpful with any questions and genuinely cares about her students.
Tyler is really awesome. She's quirky and fun and tries to do things in a creative hands-on way. You won't regret taking her.

Tyler was one of my favorite professors yet. She and I both shared a love for Disney, and she was very helpful with my first semester in college! Although there were a ton of projects throughout the semester, it was all doable considering she gave plenty of time for each assignment to be completed. I would definitely take her again!!

I have Tyler for KSU 1101 my first semester at KSU. I was terrified, but she made it AMAZING. As long as you apply yourself, and come to class, you will absolutely love this class. I would take it again in a heartbeat.
Super awesome professor in a super stupid class. Super easy to talk to. Super hot and super sexy. Super.

Tyler was one of the greatest professors Ive had this semester that class is fun though there are a good amount of projects, nothing too hard just make sure you know when everything is do. Some of the lessons may seem random but their not too bad, class usually lets out early. Over all great teacher wish I could have her again!
